oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Easter Egg Hunt at the Colemere Club, Nashville, Tennessee, 1958 April 05
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene from the Easter Egg Hunt hosted at the Colemere Country Club on April 5th, 1958. A large crowd of happy children participated in the event. The Colemere mansion and acreage, located on Murfreesboro Road near the airport, was owned by the City of Nashville at the time. It was a meeting place for civic leaders and the city’s political set. Forms part of Nashville Banner Negatives Collection. 1 photographic negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
